title: Best Instagram photos from the 2017 Oscars
text:
Salma Hayek 
Nothing comes close to the Oscars in terms of glitz, glamour and overall star power. And while we are used to seeing photos of Hollywood's biggest names posing up a storm on the red carpet, this year some of the VIP guests have given fans a sneak peek behind the scenes of the ceremony, by sharing candid snapshots on Instagram. Jessica Biel, John Legend, Emma Roberts and Keith Urban were just some of the big names posting photos from the Academy Awards with their followers. 
Click through our gallery to see some of the best insider images from the 2017 Oscars… 
Last year's Best Actress winner, Room 's Brie Larson , was overjoyed to see Emma Stone assume her title. She shared a touching photo showing her embracing Emma backstage at the ceremony, moments after the La La Land star had received her trophy. "You know what's better than winning?" she wrote. "Watching your friends win. @theacademy." Photo: © Instagram 
Victoria's Secret beauty Alessandra Ambrosio couldn't help but notice the similarities between her room's wallpaper and her children's pyjamas as she prepared to head out on Oscars night. The model shared a sweet family snapshot showing her and her partner Jamie Mazur with their two children, Anja Louise and Noah Phoenix, writing alongside: "When your kids match the wallpaper #oscarweekend." Photo: © Instagram 
BFFs Busy Philipps and Michelle Williams walked the red carpet arm-in-arm at the Oscars, and later posed for a selfie inside the ceremony, along with Salma Hayek . Sharing the photo on her Instagram account, Freaks and Geeks star Busy, 37, wrote: "World's greatest / most beautiful photo bomber." Photo: © Instagram 
Gone Girl actress Emily Ratajkowski looked flawless as she hit the red carpet at the 2017 Oscars. And she gave fans a closer look at her striking makeup ahead of the ceremony. Dressed in a plunging silver sequinned gown, and with her hair swept up, the 25-year-old was quickly inundated with compliments from her social media followers. 
Emma Roberts appeared to pay homage to aunt Julia Roberts when she stepped out for the ceremony wearing a black and white gown similar to the one Julia wore when she won her Oscar in 2000. And she later recreated Julia's iconic winning moment, mimicking the star as she posed next to her photo. "LOVE my vintage @Armani dress! Thank you to @RedCarpetGreenDress for making this day so special. #RCGD #Oscars2017 and oh hi Aunt Julia," she wrote alongside. 
Heidi Klum shared a sped-up video with her fans, showing her red carpet transformation. The 43-year-old uploaded a clip showing her getting her hair and makeup done ahead of the big event, writing in the caption: "Oscars glam from start to finish! @lindahaymakeup @wendyiles_hair #Oscars #Glam." 
Another star giving fans a glimpse inside her Oscar preparations was Jessica Biel . Justin Timberlake 's beautiful wife posed for a black and white photo with her 'glam squad' ahead of the main event, thanking them for their assistance. "#oscarsglamsquad aka my magicians," she wrote. Photo: © Instagram 
It wasn't the only photo Jessica shared. She later uploaded a funny snapshot showing her enjoying a bite to eat after the ceremony, while husband Justin is left holding her dress and looking distinctly unimpressed. "Post Oscars, Pre party. Babby daddy duty," the actress captioned the image. Photo: © Instagram 
Host Jimmy Kimmel poked fun at his 'frenemy' Matt Damon ahead of the show. He shared a picture showing him defacing the actor's seating reservation, writing: "Best Picture Vominee Matt Damon #Oscars." 
John Legend and Chrissy Teigen gave us major couple goals – again! – when they hit the red carpet at the 2017 Oscars. Singer John later took to Instagram to share a sweet photo from their arrival, showing Chrissy resting her head on his shoulder as they posed for the cameras. 
Karlie Kloss looked picture perfect as she headed out for the 2017 awards. The 24-year-old model posed for a photo in her white Stella McCartney gown featuring a cape, and wearing a spectacular diamond choker around her neck. Photo: © Instagram 
Keith Urban took fans on the Oscars red carpet, quite literally. The country singer shared a video showing him and wife Nicole Kidman arriving at the Dolby Theatre ahead of the ceremony, panning round to give a glimpse of the Oscars from an insider's perspective. 
Multitasking reached a whole new level in Naomie Harris ' hotel room. The Moonlight star shared a snapshot showing her tucking in to some food while simultaneously having her hair and makeup done. "Food and laughter with my hair and makeup peeps @peterluxhair @makeupbymario before hitting the red carpet," she wrote. 
The actress also shared a picture showing her whole squad at work ahead of the Oscars ceremony. "It takes a village!" she joked alongside. "The final look!" 
In contract to the hustle and bustle in Naomie Harris' room, Octavia Spencer was taking a more laidback approach. "@DunkinDonuts #today. I'm almost #redcarpetready but first a bit of happy time in a quiet corner with my cup of joe!!!" she captioned a photo showing her curled up with a cup of coffee. 
Priyanka Chopra pulled out all the stops for her red carpet appearance. The Indian beauty shared a photo with fans showing her with a face mask on ahead of the Oscars. "Oscars prep!" she wrote alongside. "Here we go." 
Hollywood star Salma Hayek took to Instagram to share a photo showing her posing inside the ceremony with hitmaker Pharrell Williams. "With #pharrell at the #oscars," she wrote in the caption. 
Sofia Vergara might find herself in trouble tomorrow! The Modern Family star shared a funny photo showing her posing with a miniature Oscars statuette. "I stole one #oscars2017 #vanityfair," she confessed to her fans. Related galleries
